metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10244 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Suricata version 4.0.4 incorrectly handles the parsing of an EtherNet/IP PDU. A malformed PDU can cause the parsing code to read beyond the allocated data because DecodeENIPPDU in app-layer-enip-commmon.c has an integer overflow during a length check.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
